summary: This will add armor based off the FF7 Advent Children Cloud Armor.
descriptionHtml:
*****UPDATE*****
19 Jan 2013: Uploaded fix to 1st person collar.

12 Jan 2013: Uploaded new file containing the esp fix and a new armor normal map made by Timmy19992.

07 Jan 2013: Thanks to Timmy19992, the clipping issue is now resolved and the new file has been uploaded.

Heavy set of standalone armor added.

Thanks to Shadowjin it is now available for Male Beast Races. For those who use my other armor, the same will be done for it.

====Author\'s Note====

This was not intended for release, until Platyhelminthes messaged me with a texture made for it, who saw the armor in a companion mod I made. For those who appreciate this armor, send your thanks to Platyhelminthes, because I would have not finished making it compatible for player use otherwise. It is still not available for females, but in defense there is no shortage of female armors anyway.

One more thing, I have never had an issue with it and everyone has been very nice and helpful, but please do not intentionally insult our work just to do so. By all means share your thoughts, ask questions, and offer your opinions that would help improve it, but don\'t write something just to troll. Normally I would not be bothered if a troll wrote something, but since I worked with someone else on this, I will take it very personal in their defense and not hesitate to report you. Sorry, for the little rant but an awesome modder that I use a lot of mods from left the site for awhile because of people like that. Modders work hard and sacrifice their free time to make others happy and ask nothing in return but a little respect and gratitude. Please don\'t ruin it for others and discourage modders just because you have nothing else better to do. To the people that have been nice and helpful, sincerely thank you. I have learned more about modding since my first armor, because of your advice and support.

=====About the Mod=====

REQUIRES VERSION 1.8 O SKYRIM, UPDATE YOUR GAME TO USE

Added a stand-alone, craft/enchant/temper armor to the game. You can find this armor outside of Whiterun in a chest just within Greywinter Watch. It was designed to share similarities with the Final Fantasy armor, but still remain in lore with Skyrim (which does not have zippers and such). With that in mind all resources were pulled from Skyrim and not from the Final Fantasy games.

Light Armor-
Body: 
Value 1525
Enchanting None
Weight 7
Light Armor/Leather
Armor Rating 42

Gloves:
Value 775
Enchanting None
Weight 1
Light Armor/Leather
Armor Rating 15

Boots: 
Value 975
Enchanting None
Weight 1.5
Light Armor/Leather 
Armor Rating 17

Heavy Armor-
Body: 
Value 1525
Enchanting None
Weight 9
Heavy Armor/Leather
Armor Rating 52

Gloves:
Value 775
Enchanting None
Weight 2
Heavy Armor/Leather
Armor Rating 25

Boots: 
Value 975
Enchanting None
Weight 2.5
Heavy Armor/Leather 
Armor Rating 27

Recommended Mod (If you want to change the position of swords.)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27521

=====Instructions=====

Install
1.	Download and extract file into the Data folder, by default its location should be steam/steamapp/common/Skyrim/data
2.	Use console command \'cloud\' or retrieve from chest in Greywinter Watch.

Uninstall
1.	Remove the mesh and texture folders for armor as well as the .esp file

=====Credits=====

Bethesda for the creation of Skyrim, the meshes and textures used for edit, and the creation kit.

Gimp/Photoshop

Nikscope

3DSMax

Platyhelminthes for the textures and the work in the Creation Kit

Shadowjin for helping to make it beast race compatible

Timmy19992 for the fixes to the original meshes.
author: platyhelminthes Timmy19992 and maymay1588
